DOC.brief_title: Growth Metabolic Biomarkers Healthy Term Infants Fed Formulas With Staged Protein Concentrations Over First Year Life
DOC.detailed_description: The overall objective study assess growth biomarkers energy protein metabolism healthy term infant feed two different study formula regimens birth 12 month age follow infant 4 year age .
